title: Yes/No question with dangerous consequences
author: igor2x
body_snippet:
I have been using mRemoteNG for years. Currently I am using mRemoteNG officially stable version 1.76.20 on Windows 10.

1. Open some SSH connection to e.g. Linux computer.
2. On top new tab appears that represents connection.
3. Click middle button on tab to close down connection. Problem appears. Dialog opens with question _"Do you want to close down the connection?"_ and **Yes** and **No** buttons appears. User experience problem appears. In my humble opinion Yes/No questions should almost...
